Package tilegame

Class TileGame<T extends TileGameModel,S extends TileGameGUI<U,T>,U extends TileGameController<T>>

java.lang.Object
tilegame.TileGame<T,S,U>
Type Parameters:
T - A game model that extends the TileGameModel class.
S - A graphical user interface that extends the TileGameGUI class.
U - A controller for allowing any user interface to control the game.
Direct Known Subclasses:
Game2048, SokobanGame
public abstract class TileGame<T extends TileGameModel,S extends TileGameGUI<U,T>,U extends TileGameController<T>> extends Object
The abstract class TileGame allows programmers to develop their own tile based game by supplying a TileGameModel, a TileGameGUI, and a TileGameController.
See Also:

      public TileGame(T aTileGameModel, S aTileGameGUI, U aTileGameController)
      This constructor initiates a game with the supplied parameters.
      Parameters:
      aTileGameModel - The Game Model you want to use
      aTileGameGUI - The GUI to represent the GameModel
      aTileGameController - The controller to alter the Game Model.
